review: He is very friendly to discuss about the pros and cons of the patient and take care of his patient very carefully.
*** ******** **** ** *** ** *** **** ********* ** ******** His behaviour is nice. Petaint relief with treatment. Treatment procedure satisfactory. We are glad.

We made appointment with this doctor for my daughter's acute fever condition. We were not satisfied with his consultation because he hardly spoke, adviced 13 blood tests, usg and various other tests. The consultation with rs.700 *** ** ** *** ** *** When we wanted to understand the condition he said he had no time, had to see the next patient.  Therefore I do not recommend him to other patients.

He gave me medicine for 7 days and charged 700/- and asked me to come again after 7 days.  *** *** ******** *** *** ******* * ***** **** ** *** ***** ********** ** ** ** **** ** I called him and he told me again to come on the 2nd day. He again charged me 700/-  and told me that I am getting better and come again after 5 days. Then he will give medicine and test again. 
***** *** **** **** **** *******  **** ***** *** **** ***** *** ******* **** ***

I am extremely satisfied with his treatment method. he is a friendly doctor. so, I can easily share my problems with him. He uses advanced treatment techniques always. I am living a healthy and happy life with his guidance and treatment.

He is Verryy helpfull & frndly ...looking in details of the issues...good approach towards patients ....wish him all thee bestt ..
Thnkkkuu sirr ..
Frm# iqbal ...
Very dissatisfied with his attitude a doctor should give ample time to patients which is missing in him. **** ************* *** does not listen or see the patient while talking

I am Very satisfying with his treatment,Very friendly & helpful doctor.His diagnosis is awesome.He has been treating my mother in law for more than two years.We are very much satisfied with his  diagnosis & treatment.Thank you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Very satisfying with the treatment offered. Recommend others to get treated with Dr.Amitabha Saha. He is a nice, gentle and good human being after all. His calm positive attitude towards treating the patients is laudable.
